alert.note: Alert for Santa Fe Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 2:19AM MST until January 01 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 4 inches except between 5 and 8 inches above 7000 feet. * WHERE...Santa Fe Metro Area. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Noon MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. This includes along portions of I-25. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
